urlText: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works
content:
Platforms 16, 17
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from these platforms, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

 Platforms 18, 19
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

Platforms 20, 21
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from these platforms, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

Platforms 22,23
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

Southern Concourse and Platform 24/25
From the 7 March to the 22 March 2021 the escalators between the Southern Concourse and Platform 24/25 at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works between the hours of 11pm and 4.30am.

Access to Platform 24/25 is available via stairs, lift and escalators at the Northern Concourse.

Please follow the signs and staff directions.

Northern and Grand Concourse
From 10pm Friday 26 March to 4am Monday 29 March 2021  the escalators and lifts between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works.

Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates.

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.

The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed
Access to platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse during this period.

Central Station upgrade works
From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 light rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works.

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 – 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 – 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry.

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

You can view a map of the station here. For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info
subtitle: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works

properties.speechText: There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

urlText: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works
content:
Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse access changes

From 10pm Friday 16 April to 4am Monday 19 April 2021 the escalators and lifts between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works.

Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates.

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.

Platforms 16, 17
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from these platforms, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

 Platforms 18, 19
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

Platforms 20, 21
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from these platforms, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

Platforms 22,23
Platform surface re-levelling works are being undertaken during rail shutdown weekends.

The temporary platform surface will be brushed concrete, and there will be temporary concrete ramps that connect differences in floor levels.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

The Suburban Tunnel is temporarily closed
Access to platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse during this period.

Central Station upgrade works From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 light rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works.

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 – 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 – 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry.

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

You can view a map of the station here. For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info
subtitle: Central Station: Access changes and upgrade works

content: From Thursday 8 April to Wednesday 30 June, the stairs between Town Hall station and street level will gradually close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff.

urlText: Wollongong lift outage between platform 1 and concourse
content: The lift between platform 1 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or phone 4223 5616.
subtitle: Wollongong lift outage between platform 1 and concourse
